, Peter Rice confirmed there would be four judges on the show, two men and two women, but insisted Simon Cowell would not be making the final decision on who would appear on it. It'll be four judges as it is in href="http://www.earthtimes.org/tag/England.html"> England- it's two men, two women, one of which will be Simon Cowell .'`` Simon Cowell 's going to come to us and he's going to say,` This is who I would like the judges to be,' and we'll have a conversation about it. Supporters of the internationally recognized winner of Ivory Coast's election also have pushed for a cocoa ban in an effort to financially strangle incumbent leader Laurent Gbagbo, who the UN says lost the November election. It's clear that the taxes that come from cocoa go directly to keeping Gbagbo in power. That's why we called for an export ban and it seems to be working, said Patrick Achi , spokesman for internationally recognized winner Alassane Ouattara , who is now trying to run the country from a hotel.
